Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 223 (venue provision.raw_text: Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 223 (venue provisions for District Court divisions)
Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 223 (venue provision.proposition: Venue is proper in this Court because the events giving rise to this claim occurred at the Store located in Lowell, Massachusetts, and Defendant does business in Lowell.

Mass. R. Civ. P. Rules governing venue.raw_text: Mass. R. Civ. P. Rules governing venue
Mass. R. Civ. P. Rules governing venue.proposition: Venue is proper in this Court because the events giving rise to this claim occurred at the Store located in Lowell, Massachusetts, and Defendant does business in Lowell.

Mass. R. Civ. P. 8(a), Rule 10.proposition: Plaintiff pleads the foregoing causes of action under the common-law principles of negligence recognized in Massachusetts, and consistent with the Restatement (Second) of Torts § 343 (liability for dangerous conditions or activities on land), as well as Massachusetts rules of civil procedure applicable to pleadings (Mass. R. Civ. P. 8(a), Rule 10).
